s0212.chinese: 康王即位，遍告諸侯，宣告以文武之業以申之，作《康誥》。
s0212.literal: King Kang ascended the throne and announced to all the feudal lords, declaring the enterprise of King Wen and King Wu to confirm it, making the Announcement to Kang.
s0212.idiomatic: King Kang ascended the throne and announced to all the feudal lords, declaring the enterprise of King Wen and King Wu to confirm it, making the Announcement to Kang.

s0213.chinese: 故成康之際，天下安寧，刑錯四十餘年不用。
s0213.literal: Therefore during the reigns of King Cheng and King Kang, the world was peaceful, and the punishments were set aside for over forty years without being used.
s0213.idiomatic: Therefore during the reigns of King Cheng and King Kang, the world was peaceful, and the punishments were set aside for over forty years without being used.

s0214.chinese: 康王命作策畢公分居里，成周郊，作《畢命》。
s0214.literal: King Kang commanded to make a document for Bi Gong to divide the residences in the suburbs of Chengzhou, making the Command to Bi.
s0214.idiomatic: King Kang commanded to make a document for Bi Gong to divide the residences in the suburbs of Chengzhou, making the Command to Bi.

s0215.literal: King Kang died, his son King Zhao Xia ascended.
s0215.idiomatic: King Kang died, his son King Zhao Xia ascended.

s0216.literal: During King Zhao's time, the king's way was slightly deficient.
s0216.idiomatic: During King Zhao's time, the king's way was slightly deficient.

s0217.chinese: 昭王南巡狩不返，卒於江上。
s0217.literal: King Zhao toured the south and did not return, died on the Yangtze River.
s0217.idiomatic: King Zhao toured the south and did not return, died on the Yangtze River.

s0218.literal: His death was not announced, they concealed it.
s0218.idiomatic: His death was not announced, they concealed it.

s0219.literal: King Zhao's son Man ascended, known as King Mu.
s0219.idiomatic: King Zhao's son Man ascended, known as King Mu.

s0220.chinese: 穆王即位，春秋已五十矣。
s0220.literal: King Mu ascended the throne, his age was already fifty years.
s0220.idiomatic: King Mu ascended the throne, his age was already fifty years.

s0221.chinese: 王道衰微，穆王閔文武之道缺，乃命伯臩申誡太仆國之政，作臩命。
s0221.literal: The king's way declined, King Mu grieved that the way of King Wen and King Wu was deficient, so he commanded Bo Jian to declare the policies to the Grand Master of the state, making the Command to Jian.
s0221.idiomatic: The king's way declined, King Mu grieved that the way of King Wen and King Wu was deficient, so he commanded Bo Jian to declare the policies to the Grand Master of the state, making the Command to Jian.

s0223.chinese: 穆王將征犬戎，祭公謀父諫曰：「不可。
s0223.literal: King Mu was about to campaign against the Quanrong, Ji Gong Moufu advised: 'It is not permissible.
s0223.idiomatic: King Mu was about to campaign against the Quanrong, Ji Gong Moufu advised: 'It is not permissible.

s0224.literal: The former kings displayed virtue, not reviewed troops.'
s0224.idiomatic: The former kings displayed virtue, not reviewed troops.'

s0225.chinese: 夫兵戢而時動，動則威，觀則玩，玩則無震。
s0225.literal: Weapons are stored and move at the right time; when they move they inspire awe, when reviewed they become playthings, when playthings they have no shock.
s0225.idiomatic: Weapons are stored and move at the right time; when they move they inspire awe, when reviewed they become playthings, when playthings they have no shock.

s0226.chinese: 是故周文公之頌曰：『載戢干戈，載櫜弓矢，我求懿德，肆于時夏，允王保之。』
s0226.literal: Therefore the hymn of Zhou Wen Gong says: 'We store spears and halberds, we sheath bows and arrows. I seek excellent virtue, extend it to Xia, truly the king protects it.'
s0226.idiomatic: Therefore the hymn of Zhou Wen Gong says: 'We store spears and halberds, we sheath bows and arrows. I seek excellent virtue, extend it to Xia, truly the king protects it.'

s0227.chinese: 先王之於民也，茂正其德而厚其性，阜其財求而利其器用，明利害之鄉，以文修之，使之務利而辟害，懷德而畏威，故能保世以滋大。
s0227.literal: The former kings toward the people cultivated and corrected their virtue and thickened their nature, enriched their wealth-seeking and benefited their implements, clarified the directions of benefit and harm, and cultured them to reform, causing them to pursue benefit and avoid harm, embrace virtue and fear authority, thus able to preserve the generations and grow great.
s0227.idiomatic: The former kings toward the people cultivated and corrected their virtue and thickened their nature, enriched their wealth-seeking and benefited their implements, clarified the directions of benefit and harm, and cultured them to reform, causing them to pursue benefit and avoid harm, embrace virtue and fear authority, thus able to preserve the generations and grow great.

s0228.chinese: 昔我先王世后稷以服事虞、夏。
s0228.literal: Formerly our former kings served Yu and Xia by succeeding Hou Ji.
s0228.idiomatic: Formerly our former kings served Yu and Xia by succeeding Hou Ji.

s0229.chinese: 及夏之衰也，棄稷不務，我先王不窋用失其官，而自竄於戎狄之閒。
s0229.literal: When Xia declined, they abandoned agriculture and did not attend to it. Our former king Bu Ku lost his office because of this, and hid himself among the Rong and Di.
s0229.idiomatic: When Xia declined, they abandoned agriculture and did not attend to it. Our former king Bu Ku lost his office because of this, and hid himself among the Rong and Di.

s0230.chinese: 不敢怠業，時序其德，遵修其緒，修其訓典，朝夕恪勤，守以敦篤，奉以忠信。
s0230.literal: They dared not neglect the enterprise, ordered their virtue in sequence, followed and repaired their legacy, repaired their teachings and statutes, morning and evening respectfully diligent, guarded with sincerity and solidity, served with loyalty and faith.
s0230.idiomatic: They dared not neglect the enterprise, ordered their virtue in sequence, followed and repaired their legacy, repaired their teachings and statutes, morning and evening respectfully diligent, guarded with sincerity and solidity, served with loyalty and faith.

s0231.literal: Through generations they carried virtue, not disgracing their ancestors.
s0231.idiomatic: Through generations they carried virtue, not disgracing their ancestors.
